title: Malala Yousafzai breaks silence on Taliban, calls for 'immediate cease-fire'
content:
1. Malala Yousafzai breaks silence on Taliban, calls for 'immediate cease-fire'  New York Post
  2. What will an Afghanistan under the Taliban look like? Its rise to power in the '90s paints a grim picture  CNN
  3. Pentagon blames Afghan army in closed House briefing: 'You can't buy willpower'  Fox News
  4. Were U.S. losses in vain? 'Forever war' in Afghanistan resulted in fewer terror attacks  USA TODAY
  5. Factbox: Taliban seek to present a moderate face as they take control in Afghanistan  Reuters
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: マララ・ユサフザイさん、タリバンについて沈黙を破り、「即時停戦」を要求
马拉拉-尤萨夫扎伊打破对塔利班的沉默，呼吁 "立即停火"。
馬拉拉-尤薩夫扎伊打破對塔利班的沉默，呼籲 "立即停火"。
